Class ResolverFromSummarizers<T>

public class ResolverFromSummarizers<T>

    Resolver using two summarizers to compute the delta.

      • from

        public static <T> Resolver<T> from(Summarizer remote,
                   Summarizer local,
                   Deserializer<T> deserializer)
        Deprecated. 
        Builds a resolver from a local and a remote summarizer.

        Both summarizers must produce compatible summaries, for example they have to use identical serialization and digest computation.

        Parameters:
        remote - the summarizer providing remote state.
        local - the summarizer providing local state.
        deserializer - the deserializer of items.
        Returns:
        a configured resolver.
